scripts.qa:profiles:export: npm run -s export:m1m2 && npm run -s qa:profiles
scripts.test: echo "No tests yet. See tests/fetcher.spec.md for manual scenarios." && exit 0
scripts.qa:fp:all: npm run -s qa:fp:success && npm run -s qa:fp:no_picks && npm run -s qa:fp:error
scripts.qa:fp:neg:all: npm run -s qa:fp:neg:dup && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:side && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:rrr && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:entry && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:vwap && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:adv && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:conf && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:lev
scripts.qa:fp:neg:all:report: rm -f out/fp_neg_results.json && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:dup -- --write out/fp_neg_results.json && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:side -- --write out/fp_neg_results.json && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:rrr -- --write out/fp_neg_results.json && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:entry -- --write out/fp_neg_results.json && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:vwap -- --write out/fp_neg_results.json && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:adv -- --write out/fp_neg_results.json && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:conf -- --write out/fp_neg_results.json && npm run -s qa:fp:neg:lev -- --write out/fp_neg_results.json
